entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Gananoque
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:29 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. Temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon.
